JobTitle: Product Manager - Consumer Hardware (Facebook Reality Labs)
JobFullDesc: The Reality Labs hardware teams at Facebook build our VR, AR, and Portal devices. The potential of these products to connect the world is immense—and we’re just getting started. Come work alongside the team to ship emerging technologies like AR, VR and smart homes to hundreds of millions, driving the state of the art forward with breakthrough work in computer vision, advanced optics, eye tracking, mixed reality, and new ways to deliver social presence.As a Product Manager focused on hardware, you'll lead development of new hardware, hardware changes, strategic expansion initiatives, key new use cases, and guidance of the team through key program milestones. You'll also be responsible for identifying and tracking key performance indicators, including adhering to a build schedule. The ideal candidate is a highly organized individual with a passion for user experience and professional experience building complex, user-centric hardware products.Own development of new and in-market hardware products.Strategically evolve and grow existing products and services to constantly deliver a better user experience.Identify immediate and/or upcoming user needs, then work with the team to develop a product plan that addresses them.Manage hardware tradeoffs, spanning compute, battery, ergonomics, audio, displays, and optics.Partner with software and experience teams to deliver on key use cases.Manage collaboration and communication with other teams, both internal and external, to ensure teams have what they need and can work efficiently.Collaborate with other teams inside Facebook to drive innovative changes.MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS4+ years product management experience with 2+ years of experience on hardware platformsExperience managing delivery of 1 or more hardware/software productsExperience managing and overseeing multiple on-going initiatives simultaneouslyPREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS4+ years product management experience with 2+ years of experience on hardware platformsExperience managing delivery of 1 or more hardware/software productsExperience managing and overseeing multiple on-going initiatives simultaneouslyFacebook's mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together.
